snippet.title: Farming Simulator 20 - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Mobile farmers can rejoice, as Farming Simulator mobile series launches into its next round with Farming Simulator 20 simultaneously on Nintendo Switch, iOS and Android phones and tablets!

Farm wherever you want to and immerse yourself into our new huge map with valleys and sweeping hills, ready to be tended to by you. Grow and harvest any of the ten crops like wheat, potatoes and new in Farming Simulator 20: Cotton and Oat! 

If crops aren’t enough for you, then expand into livestock with cows, pigs, sheep or with the new horses. Giddyup! 
Prepare your fields and sow them. Then, take good care of them until it’s harvest time! Fill up your silos and sell your products on the dynamic market and grow your farm even further. Over 100 vehicles and machines are ready for your farming needs including John Deere, but also Case IH, New Holland, Challenger, Fendt, Valtra, Krone, Deutz-Fahr and many more.
And we didn’t stop there. We improved on the graphics in 3rd person and cockpit view, so you can immerse yourself even more while farming on the go.

A deep and powerful simulation experience in the palm of your hands, Farming Simulator 20 brings a slew of new features for virtual farmers anywhere!

Farming Simulator 20 will be available on December 3rd 2019 on Nintendo Switch at retail and download from the Nintendo eShop. The iOS and Android version will be available at their respective stores.

► Farming Simulator Website: http://www.farming-simulator.com/ 
► Farming Simulator League Website: https://fsl.giants-software.com/
► Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/giants.farming.simulator
► Twitter: https://twitter.com/farmingsim
► FSL Twitter: https://twitter.com/FSLeSports
► Discord: https://discord.gg/giantssoftware
► Twitch: https://twitch.tv/giantssoftware
► Mixer: https://mixer.com/GiantsSoftware
► Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/giantsfarmingsimulator/
► Get Farming Simulator 19 now on the official shop: https://www.farming-simulator.com/store.php
